# Joshua Pascual

> Joshua Pascual (jjspscl) is a Software Developer based in the Philippines, passionate about building modern web applications. This is his personal portfolio website showcasing his projects, blog posts, and professional experience.

## About

Joshua Pascual is a full-stack developer with expertise in modern web technologies including TypeScript, React, Astro, and Node.js. He is passionate about creating performant, accessible, and user-friendly web applications.

Key information:
- **Name**: Joshua Pascual
- **Handle**: jjspscl
- **Role**: Software Developer
- **Location**: Philippines
- **Website**: https://jjspscl.com

## Pages

- [Home](https://jjspscl.com/): Main landing page with introduction and navigation
- [About](https://jjspscl.com/about): Detailed information about Joshua's background, skills, and experience
- [Blog](https://jjspscl.com/blog): Technical blog posts about software development, programming tutorials, and learning journeys
- [Projects](https://jjspscl.com/projects): Portfolio of software projects and applications built by Joshua
- [Contact](https://jjspscl.com/contact): Contact form and information to get in touch with Joshua

## Technical Stack

This portfolio website is built with:
- **Framework**: Astro (static site generator with islands architecture)
- **Styling**: Tailwind CSS
- **CMS**: Storyblok (headless CMS)
- **Hosting**: Cloudflare Pages
- **Language**: TypeScript

## Optional

- [GitHub Profile](https://github.com/jjspscl): Source code repositories and open source contributions
